entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with 30 percent chance of snow overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Thursday 4 May 2023
